title: Typographer
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231651/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231651/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Typographer**

A practitioner of [typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231651/http:/typophile.com/wiki/typography), sometimes _incorrectly_ referred to as a [fontographer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231651/http:/typophile.com/wiki/fontographer). Not to be confused with [Type Designer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231651/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Type%20Designer).
author: vinceconnare
